about_the_game:
About this game:
This is a single player game, puzzle game, and casual game.
This is a small game about love desserts, where players can be controlled to eat corresponding desserts by using the arrow keys (left and right) on the computer.



In addition, this game can help friends with dietary needs to diet by playing games. Eating 70% full is beneficial for health. When you need to control your diet, you can play games to avoid excessive food intake and reduce the sugar burden caused by eating Dim sum; This is an interesting little game and also a small tool to help control diet. I promise to donate more than half of the profits to the Love Cafeteria, which provides nutritious and healthy food for low-income groups; It is obvious that this donation comes from my own income.

name: Sweet honey: Cake

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NOT REQUIRED
  • VR Support: Not Supported
  • Additional Notes: NONE
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NOT REQUIRED
  • VR Support: Not Supported
  • Additional Notes: NONE

short_description: Each level has some tasks, such as eating 3 breads and 3 candies. You need to control the player to eat these quantities of desserts through the directional keys (left and right).If you complete these tasks within the specified time, you can pass this level, otherwise you will fail.
